com.soa.security.script.saml1

Class SAML1

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.security.script.saml1.SAML1

  • public class SAML1
extends java.lang.Object
    A SAMLv1 assertion. You can retrieve a SAMLv1 assertion from an authenticated subject as follows: 
        saml = subject.getSAML1();

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AttributeStatement[] getAttributeStatements()
      Returns an array of AttributeStatements made by the assertion.
      AuthenticationStatement[] getAuthenticationStatements()
      Returns an array of AuthenticationStatements made by the assertion.
      java.lang.String getC14nAlgo()
      Returns the canonicalization algorithm used.
      long getExpirationDate()
      Returns the time the assertion becomes invalid in milliseonds.
      java.lang.String getId()
      Returns the assertion ID.
      java.lang.String getIssueInstant()
      Returns the instant in time the assertion was issued as a date string.
      java.lang.String getIssuer()
      Returns the issuer of the assertion.
      java.security.cert.X509Certificate getIssuerCert()
      Returns the X.509 certificate of the issuer.
      java.security.PublicKey getIssuerPublicKey()
      Returns the public key of the issuer.
      java.lang.String getSignatureAlgo()
      Returns the signature algorithm used.
      long getStartDate()
      Returns the time the assertion becomes valid in milliseconds.
      SubjectStatement[] getSubjectStatements()
      Returns an array of SubjectStatements made by the assertion.
